universal_uiFitpair_enabledFitPair: Do you want to enable FitPair on this device?
universal_uiFitpair_fitpairDescription:
When using the heart rate broadcasting in the Train Live gym, your activity exercise file will be recorded, shared, and competed with others in the gym.
※Both the device settings and personal privacy settings can be modified in the future
universal_uiFitpair_fitpairDetailDescrip:
Fit pair is a IoT fitness integration system developed by Alatech Inc. If you have a compatible Alatech device, you can use Ant+ or Bluetooth signal to send to Trina Live™ (1), which will record your exercise process and instantly broadcast online.
The live broadcast allows the gym coach or instructor to better understand your physical condition, so that they can help you making adjustment or improvement, the interaction between members will be enhanced. After finishing the activity or course, all of your exercise history records will be transferred to your activity record for creating a trend report.
When live broadcasting and recording the exercise data, the privacy information can be decided and set by the user.

(1)Trina Live™ is an application executed by the gym, and with the application of Wasp, the coach can live broadcast and record exercise history data.

universal_waspSetUp_environment: When looking for a suitable location to set up WASP, it is recommended to install in a high place without any cover. The best receiving range is 6*6meter per WASP device. Fit pair might be slow if is installed beyond the suggested range.

universal_waspSetUp_mobileNoWaspFind: No WASP device is found, please make sure the WASP is connected to the same Wi-Fi network, And WIFI WASP is in double flashing green light mode.
universal_waspSetUp_mobileScanWasp: Connect mobile to search WASP device via router.
universal_waspSetUp_poeWasp: Use Ethernet cable to connect router with DATA IN of PoE injector, and use Ethernet cable to connect DATA&POWER OUT of PoE injector with WASP
universal_waspSetUp_waspApMode: Turn on the WASP by holding the power button for three seconds. Press the power button to put the WASP in AP mode when red light is flashing rapidly. In AP mode, the green light should be flashing once per second.

Get your physical analysis
Life Tracking, Real Time Sharing and Fun Competitions; All on GPT Center!
universal_app_alaconnectInfo: View your workout data on your phone, with compatible devices, you can set up Step Goals, Heart Rate Monitor, Sleep Goals, and more! It will record these all for you while exercising!

universal_app_cloudRunInfo: Cloud run will simulate the elevation of existing routes on yours and your friends Alatech treadmill. Real-time virtual competition anytime, at your house.
universal_app_trainLiveSlogan:
Build Real-Time Workout Data
Make Your Group Training More Efficient and Effective
universal_app_trainLiveInfo: Provide trainers with student members’ real-time workout data and synchronized workout intensity for more efficient training! Activity records are also available to students!

universal_group_joinClassStatement: Alatech Center will provide sport and workout reports, Life Tracking data, or other long term recording and analysis. The purpose of which allows coaches to provide professional guidance and analysis for student members’ fitness performance. This platform DOES NOT intend to provide any medical advice or diagnostics. Fitness institutions and/or coaches are advised to survey and understand any possible health or medical condition of their students, both physically and mentally, which may restrict the student member’s capability or causing harm to themselves in class performance, prior to any course activity. When accepting to this terms thereof, all the student members will be suggested to edit their privacy settings for their workout reports, and change the privacy status into {{object}}. Student members may edit their privacy setting in their personal profile, or withdraw from the course and end the coach-student relationship. Alatech holds no responsibility to any injuries or harms in class. Students members are responsible to consult their coaches and/or the fitness institution where their classes are held regarding their own limitation and class intensity.
universal_group_createClassStatement: Alatech Center will provide sport and workout reports, Life Tracking data, or other long term recording and analysis. The purpose of which allows coaches to provide professional guidance and analysis for student members’ fitness performance. This platform DOES NOT intend to provide any medical advice or diagnostics.

The color red indicates the weight you are carrying is close to a high percentage of your own body weight, or of higher level; on the other hand, the color blue indicates the opposite.

universal_group_onlyProvideRecordStateme: Alatech Center will provide sport and workout reports, Life Tracking data, or other long term recording and analysis. The purpose of which allows coaches to provide professional guidance and analysis for student members’ fitness performance. This platform DOES NOT intend to provide any medical advice or diagnostics.
universal_group_masterStateOfMindStateme: For coaches, please be sure to understand each student member’ health condition or do they have any existing injuries or restrictions, and/or survey the students if they have any health restrictions.
universal_group_fitnessGroupDisclaimer: Alatech holds no responsibility to any injuries or harms occur in class or while using Alatech products. Students members/or trainees are responsible to consult their coaches and/or the fitness institution where their classes are held regarding their own limitation and class intensity.
universal_group_createFitnessGroupPrivac: Once your student members have agree with the Terms, their privacy setting for “future workout” or workout report will changed automatically and privacy status will be titled “My Gym.” The student members can still edit their privacy settings or withdraw from the course and end the trainer-trainee relationship.
universal_group_joinFitnessGroupPrivacyS: Before attending any course activities, be sure to provide information regarding any existing injuries or restrictions, and/or abide by surveys that concerns about the aforementioned conditions from the coaches and the fitness institutions responsible.
universal_privacy_editPrivacyStatement: Once you have read and agree with the terms, your privacy status will automatically switch to “my gym.” This may change the visibility of your workout report and other data to the public. You can change these features on your personal profile or withdraw from the course and end the trainer-trainee relationship.
universal_privacy_addSportsPrivacyStatem: The privacy status will depend on the visibility of your newly added activity records, reports, and/or life tracking data. The activity data shared externally may include your heart rate and activity location. You can change your privacy status in anytime.
universal_sportsTerm_weightTrainingEffec: Strength Training Outcome: This chart uses the percentage of 1RM and BW as quantitative basis. The higher percentile represents relatively greater strength, and is indicated by changing from blue to red.
universal_sportsTerm_oneRepMax: 1RM, is short for One-Repetition Maximum, or One Rep Max. It represents the maximum strength the muscle could bear in each contraction. For instance, if a person could perform Bench Press 8 times per session with 50 kg of weight but only once for 62 kg, then 62kg is his/her 1RM for Bench Press. Each posture requires movements from different muscle groups therefore the 1RM rate for each muscle group will differ.
universal_sportsTerm_bodyWeight:
BW Stands for Body-Weight, this calculation is based on one’s own body weight. For instance, it should be within a normal range when a 90kg person is capable of lifting 90kg of weight in bench press, whereas it would be of professional level for a 60kg person lifting up 90kg of weight.
Therefore, you should set your goals based on your own body weight. For example, you can set goals of lifting up 75% of your weight in 1 month, achieving 100%BW in 3 months, and reaching 150%BW, or professional level, in 1 year. With clear goals like this can motivate you to continue on.
universal_sportsTerm_viceMuscle: The white areas indicates the supporting muscle groups and are solely for labeling and reference.
universal_sportsTerm_zone5: Lactate Steady State, MLSS - you can train for lactic acid resistance and oxygen uptake in short segments but not for a long period.
universal_sportsTerm_zone4: Training in this zone is mainly for endurance running; staying within your lactate threshold can improve your strength and speed.
universal_sportsTerm_zone3: Training in this zone helps you improve basic fitness level and muscle strength; it represents intermediate level of endurance and training.
universal_sportsTerm_zone2: Shows that you are staying right beneath, almost reaching, the aerobic threshold; this is an ideal zone for fat burning.
universal_sportsTerm_zone1: Indicates warm-up and/or recovery heart rate between workout.
universal_deviceSetting_rotateFigure8Mot: Rotate watch in a figure-8 motion
universal_deviceSetting_onMenuStop: Turn On, Menu, Pause Your Workout
universal_popUpMessage_webError404: 404: Page not found or not accessed, You can try again after signing in.
universal_popUpMessage_webError403: 403: It seems like you don’t have permission to access.
universal_deviceSetting_horizontalPositi: Place the watch on a horizontal position and wait
universal_group_followExerciseTypeCreate: Create your report according to your workout types and class time
universal_group_exerciseEffectiveness: You can evaluate your workout efficiency according to the average heart rate zones and new fat-burn in body fat percentage.
universal_group_myReportOnPeriod: {{number}} workout reports of {{class}} class, established from {{startDate}}~{{endDate}}.
universal_group_allMembersReport: Trainers can evaluate the training focuses and calculate the total calorie burn by viewing the average heart rate zones in the class's workout summary.
universal_activityData_stepReportDescrip: The actual step counts are divided by whether your goals have been accomplished. You can evaluate your performance by the color division.
universal_activityData_hrReportDescripti: A person's maximum heart rate is determined by one's hereditary factors and age. Resting heart rate reflects one's recover level or physique. Both data are crucial components in finding the right workout intensity.
universal_activityData_sleepReportInstru: You can analyze your sleeping quality by reading the report on each of your sleeping stages and turn over times.
universal_activityData_bodyDistributionR: Through the fat burn rate and body fat rate quadrant, trainers can collect the data on the average physique of the class members. This data comes in handy when observing whether the group has improved and set up goals from there.
universal_activityData_activityAnalysisR: All of the group's activity types are listed out according to active rate and time. The trainer can observe every single activity report and analyze based on time and heart rate zone trend.
universal_activityData_hrStatisticsDurin: You can make adjustment on training intensity and goals by reading the total ratio of each heart rate zone during activities. This data is based on  [number] of activities.
universal_activityData_hrZoneTrendReport: See your time spent on each heart rate zone to measure your heart rate efficiency. You can view this trend chart to see if you have achieved the ideal intensity level and fulfill your goals.
universal_activityData_muscleColorIllust: The color scale is based on your one-repetition maximum (1RM)/ Body Weight ratio. This shows the 1RM of each muscle.
universal_activityData_trainingTrendDesc: From the bars below you can see the ratio of your 1RM (top of the bar) and average weight (bottom of the chart). You can determine your training intensity base on the correlation between the two. The total number in sets will determine the length between the top and the bottom. The longer the bar is, indicating that you've more counts in each sets, and vice versa.
universal_activityData_highEnoughToUseMe: Exceeding Normal Range: may involve drug use.
universal_activityData_valuesOnlyPossibl: Way Exceeding Normal: only possible through drug use.
universal_privacy_usingSharing: Once you have enabled “Sharing,” your privacy setting will automatically make available to “Anyone”
universal_activityData_findBodyFatMeter: Looking for device, please measure later.
universal_activityData_standOnBodyFatMet: Please step on the Body Fat Monitor

Find the device you have trouble pairing on [My Devices] from the [Bluetooth] page. Select the blue [i] on the right of the device name and select [Forget This Device] to cancel the pairing. Turn off the Bluetooth and turn it back on to re-pair.

universal_group_joinStatementP1: Alatech Center only provides analysis based on activity records, daily life tracking, or any long-term data collection. This allows {{partyB}}'s physical wellness and arrange suitable training routine. However, the purpose of this platform does not include providing medical guidance or diagnosis. When {{partyB}} first started an activity, the responsible event supervisor must make sure if {{partyB}} has any physical or mental condition that may restrict {{partyB}} to certain activity or propose danger to {{partyB}}.
universal_group_joinStatementP2: Alatech is not responsible for those who fail to provide, or intentionally conceal, truthful information regarding to physical conditions, need medical attention or treatment. When you have agree with the acknowledgement, you will be advised to edit the Privacy Settings and enable your information to {{partyB}} relationship.

universal_privacy_yourAdministrator: Your group administrator, such as fitness coach or manager from your enterprise.
universal_activityData_eventFileInformat: The Activity Data might include your workout data, heart rate, speed, location, altitude, activity type, course, device information, etc.
universal_activityData_sportsStatisticsI: Your Exercise Report collects your activity and heart rate data from a certain time frame, this report does not indlcude location information.
universal_lifeTracking_lifeStatisticsInf: Daily Life Report collects from a certain time frame of your life data such as daily heart rate, sleeping condition, step count, age, height, weight, and physique, etc.
universal_activityData_personalInformati: The system will provide analysis based on different age, gender, physical data…etc. If you have question regarding to the system's report and analysis, please consult your fitness coach or your physician for professional guideline and suggestions regarding your physical.
universal_activityData_sharedLifeMeta: {{nickName}} has share life tracking record from | {{YYYY-MM-DD}}~{{YYYY-MM-DD}} | 。
universal_group_insufficientAuthority: You are not permitted to access data for {{number}}  person(s).
universal_activityData_ftpZ0Info: This is the right zone to reduce the accumulated lactic acid. When the oxygen metabolizability rate is higher than consumption rate, there are enough oxygen in the muscle to burn the lactic acids.
universal_activityData_ftpZ1Info: You can sustain longer in this zone and improve your aerobic endurance in fixed speed through enhancing the lactate threshold and increasing glycogen storage in the muscles.
universal_activityData_ftpZ2Info: Most efficient zone, can last from 2 to 8 hours. The major zone for training and competition.
universal_activityData_ftpZ3Info: The upper limit of lactate threshold of the human body. If the accumulation of lactate has exceeded the depletion, it is going to impact your speed and physical performance.
universal_activityData_ftpZ4Info: You have exceeded the limit of the amount of oxygen the red blood cell could carry. Your muscles are short of oxgygen becasue muscles' oxygen consumption rate has exceeded the oxygen intake.
universal_activityData_ftpZ5Info: Starting from here, you energy system is mainly anaerobic based, which lactic acid is accumulating. If you have accumulated too much lactic acid in your body, you cannot perform high intensity workout, and should return to the aerobic zone.
universal_activityData_ftpZ6Info: Your current energy system is ATP-PC system, which you might be able to sustain for 5 to 15 seconds. The ability of doing so comes from the storage of creatine phosphate and glucose in the muscles. Your muscle mass is a decisive factor for your performance in this zone.

universal_race_theFinalRankingIsBasedOnT: Final ranking is dependent on the data collected by the server.
universal_activityData_welcomeUseText: No matter if you need to collect data from outdoor activities, indoor fitness, group sports, or daily health tracking, Alatech devices are your best solution on recording, cloud storage, and getting feedbacks.
universal_checkEnvironment_pushNotificat: Check if the authorization for push notification is on.
Enable push notification for comments on workout, activity reminder, discounts, and more.
universal_naturalLanguageLife_noSync: It's been a while since your previous Life Tracking update. Sync your device now to see your newest progress!
universal_group_weakSignal: Weak signal or device not supported.
universal_activityData_noData: You have yet created any activity or life tracking file.
universal_app_connectSlogan: Workout any time, sync anywhere. Get your workout and life tracking analysis.
universal_app_hrInfo1: Heart rate is the best indicator for your physical condition. Since heart rate and the VO2Max are in direct relation with each other, it is very practical to monitor your workout intensity based on your heart rate. Use heart rate zone to indicate activity intensity is one of the simplest and most common method.
universal_app_hrInfo2: Through observing changes within your heart rate zones, you can identify if you are under or over training. You can also quickly assess your endurance and recovery level.
universal_app_sportsScienceInfo1: We have categorized collected data based on different sport types, such as coordinate, speed, altitude  for running; watt, cadence for cycling. You can see all these data  on GPTFit with colorful visuals.
universal_app_sportsScienceInfo2: Different data groups are put into zones and represented by colors. Through compare and contrast past records and analysis, you can observe your progress at a glance.
universal_app_lifeInfo1: A healthy lifestyle is accumulated by daily progress. Even small improvement on step counts, heart rate performance, sleep quality are meaningful. Putting on a wearable device can help you measure your health data 24/7. Through the collected data, you can have better mastery over your physique, such as body fat, muscle ratio, body water percentage, and more.
universal_app_lifeInfo2: View your daily progress at a glance. Recording the smallest change in your life and all the information you need, this system will motivate you to lead an active and healthy lifestyle.
universal_app_groupInfo1: Through GPT Fit group training system, you can analyze the data of your members. A better understanding on their performance will help you to observe their needs, such as preferred speed, purpose, best cadence, etc.
universal_app_groupInfo2: Through collecting data on physique, such as weight, fat rate, muscle rate, etc., you can train your team, manage your gym, or promote fitness in your enterprise more efficiently and encourage one another for improvement.
universal_app_groupInfoComment1: 1. Members need to join the group and agree to the privacy policy to enable their data to go public.
universal_app_gptInfo2: GPT Fit offers an environment for numerous sports options and daily life recording. Whether it is for personal use or for your gym, through compatible wearable device, mobile apps, and iot fitness equipment, you can easily collect data for different activities.
universal_app_gptInfo3: GPT Fit  will provide the record and analysis no matter if you are doing outdoor running, aerobic activities, swimming, weight training, group training, gym workout, or even advocating fitness in your business.
universal_app_wearableInfo1: Our wearable devices are designed for the needs of athletes. There are different programs and data display for variety of sport types, such as cadence for running, power for cycling, muscle endurance for weight training, swimming posture, calorie consumption for aerobic activity and more. The awareness of your health also extend to daily life tracking: on daily basis, the devices can record step count, heart rate, sleep condition, etc.
universal_app_wearableInfo2: We strive to provide users a scientific and efficient workout experience for a healthy lifestyle. Through AlaConnect™ app, you can sync data from your devices with the cloud database, which allows long-term tracking and analysis. You can then view your workout and daily life tracking analysis on the GPTFit to observe your progress!
universal_app_appInfo1: The application supports personal use, wearable devices, and gym. You can record and upload all multiple types of workout activities including outdoor running, cycling, weight training, treadmill training, rower routine, aerobic activities, and more.
universal_app_appInfo2: You can view all the relevant data such as coordinate and route, distance, time, cadence, watt, weight training sets, training parts, altitude, and calorie burn rate. The application provides more than 40 weight training programs and is compatible with more than thousands of Bluetooth equipment and sensors.
universal_app_iotInfo1: Designed for gym and group trainers, in sets with sensors, ATTACUS wearable devices, and equipment. Trainers can now view their students' data on the TrainLIVE app own by either the gym or the trainer.
universal_app_iotInfo2: Group workout data is recorded LIVE through TrainLIVE and send to trainee's cloud simultaneously as analysis reports.
universal_btDevice_toSystemCompleteUnpai: Please go to the system to complete unpair.
